original_title: 古川もとあき with VOYAGER LIVE 2008 TOKYO & KOBE
overview: Recorded live in Tokyo in September 2008 and Kobe in November 2008. Three years have passed since the resurrection of VOYAGER, and thus a new tour began. This DVD combines the sets from LIVE GATE Tokyo and Kobe Winterland and showcases both new and classic material.
title: MOTOAKI FURUKAWA with VOYAGER LIVE 2008 TOKYO & KOBE
